title: How to Make Mini Banana Muffins

steps.headline: Combine the bananas, applesauce, sugar, and egg thoroughly in a large mixing bowl.
Add and mix the rest of the ingredients into the mixture.
Spray a mini muffin pan with no stick cooking spray.
Pour the mixture into the mini muffin pan molds, approximately 2/3 full.
Let the muffins sit for 10 minutes.
Remove the muffins from the pan and onto a cooling rack.

tyn: 2 mini muffin tins (24 mini muffins per tin)
text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Combine the bananas, applesauce, sugar, and egg thoroughly in a large mixing bowl.  Add and mix the rest of the ingredients into the mixture.  Spray a mini muffin pan with no stick cooking spray.  Pour the mixture into the mini muffin pan molds, approximately 2/3 full.  Bake the muffins for 15 minutes.  Remove from the oven.  Let the muffins sit for 10 minutes.  Remove the muffins from the pan and onto a cooling rack.  Serve.  Cover and refrigerate.
sentences: Combine the bananas, applesauce, sugar, and egg thoroughly in a large mixing bowl.
Add and mix the rest of the ingredients into the mixture.
Spray a mini muffin pan with no stick cooking spray.
Pour the mixture into the mini muffin pan molds, approximately 2/3 full.
Let the muffins sit for 10 minutes.
Remove the muffins from the pan and onto a cooling rack.
